colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @015A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DPAL LDAN 'BRAS SPUNGS KYI SMAN PA GRVA TSANG GI SLOB DPON MKHAN PO SMAN RAMS PAS; 'GRO BA RNAMS KYI NAD SEL BA'I CHED DU RGYAB RTEN DBUNG MNYEN LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BKA' CHEN YI DAM MCHOG DHARMA SVA MIS MKHAN CHEN ZHI BA 'TSO'I MDZAD PA'I YIG CHAR GZHI BYAS NAS BRIS PA 'GRO BA SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYIS DUG GSUM GYI RGYU 'BRAS BZHAD LAS MYUR BA NYID TU GROL NAS BDE GSHEGS BRGYAD KYI GO 'PHANG TSE 'DI NYID LA THOB PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE LEGS 'PHEL,,)
